Small probes rotates fast enough without, still rotate fast enough with an 18 ton tank and LV-N. Add an main stage still attached and it rotate slowly.

Massive motherships need rcs if they need to turn fast, even if they have reaction wheel torque modules, but they need rcs for docking anyway.

For landers rcs is nice for sideways movement during final decent, work far more easy than tilting the ship to move sideways. However I don't add it on landers who are pretty stable and I don't plan to dock again.
